title: # 437 - Joel McHale & ME
description:
Today I sit down with actor/comedian Joel McHale. We talk about being competitive, how he got “The Soup”, shooting “The Cabin”, Ms.Pat & Kaley Cuoco, our knife collections, and much more!  

 

Check out Joel McHale & Ken Jeong’s Podcast “The Darkest Timeline” here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-darkest-timeline-with-ken-jeong-joel-mchale/id1504921890 

 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Go to https://www.fiverr.com and use code “Bertcast” for 10% off your first order

 

This episode is also brought to you by Mint Mobile. Cut your unlimited wireless bill to $30 a month at http://www.mintmobile.com/bertcast  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
